https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/iB7Q8N9lIVsg0JwWyilZ0xh0WjK.jpg In Hong Kong, a vigilante serial killer leaves death notices, stating when and how he will murder a victim. Even if the victim reports it to the police and receives protection, the killer can easily break through and execute them. In response, the police set up a special task force and reveals a major conspiracy hidden behind. Death Notice
